si.title: අනුර පරාජය කළේ කවුද?
body_lines: ජනාධිපතිවරණයේදී ඡන්ද තුන් ලක්ෂයක් අවලංගු විය. ලක්ෂ 38 ක ඡන්ද ගෙවීමක් නොවීය. මේ දෙකෙහිම සාර්ථකත්වය තීරණය කරන වැදගත්ම සාධක වේ.

en.title: Who made Anura beat?
body_lines: Three hundred thousand votes were invalid in the presidential election. 38 lakh votes were not paid. Both of these are the most important factors that determine success.

summary_lines: Anura beat was likely due to:
These factors significantly impacted the outcome, making them crucial determinants of success.
